head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: xsl:stylesheet

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: xsl:stylesheet

body.p: The xsl:stylesheet element is always the top-level element of an XSLT stylesheet. The name xsl:transform may be used as a synonym.
The following attributes may be specified:

td.p: Mandatory. A value other than "1.0" invokes forwards compatibility mode.

Value "yes" or "no": default no. If set to "yes", causes activation of templates to be traced on System.err for diagnostic purposes. The value may be overridden by specifying a saxon:trace attribute on the individual template.
